topic.title: 08chan updating doesnt work?
topic.body:
08chan updating seems to doesnt work anymore for me
Everything has stopped around 10hours ago
Why this happened?
Around 2000users but still..
Is there anything I can do about it?

1565163816_1JwnMobAn82kxrY5FXnjwMBFbLyzi.body:
its way of imageboards users are working
think of it as a code, not serious messages

1565185775_1CBZY3cuYKeHZXEeHVxRFLmsCr3Um.body:
>illegal combination of 0s and 1s
There is no even such thing 
Just get over it as everyone should
And at some point try to understand that CP is illegal only for reason of censorship everything over internet
((They)) don't care about children or whatever
But I understand u might feel unsafe for this reason, thats why just encrypt your harddrive and dont really care anymore

1559069408_19aXxMN25h3rLrxTb3hjy7WJns13M.body:
Setup your own vpn on vps or dedicated server
I don't really trust any of those big vpn companies, they are lying about not keeping any logs
Its clear when they have servers in so many countries where local law enforce them to have logs
And they still keep repeating you, 'we do not keeps any logs!'
